profile.name: Chris Wanstrath
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Stripe | Ruby & Python Expert
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for open-source development and innovative technologies. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions, leveraging expertise in Ruby, Python, and JavaScript.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Stripe
description: Designed and implemented a scalable web application using Ruby on Rails, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement.
Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including a popular gem for database sharding.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Built a custom web application using Python and Django, delivering a 25% increase in sales for a client.
Contributed to multiple open-source projects, including a popular gem for localization.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated the GitHub repository for a popular Ruby gem, ensuring its continued stability and security.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve the overall quality of the project.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed a custom web application using Ruby on Rails, delivering a 20% increase in user engagement for a client.
Contributed to multiple open-source projects, including a popular gem for package management.
